section.title: cfg.set
section.para: Set the value of a configuration variable and commit the change immediately

section.title: cfg.set_now_int
section.para: Set the value of a configuration variable and commit the change immediately

section.title: cfg.seti
section.para: Set the value of a configuration variable and commit the change immediately

section.title: cfg.set_now_string
section.para: Set the value of a configuration variable and commit the change immediately

section.title: cfg.sets
section.para: Set the value of a configuration variable and commit the change immediately

section.title: cfg.del
section.para: Delete the value of a configuration variable from a group instance and commit the change immediately

section.title: cfg.set_delayed
section.para: Prepare the change of a configuration variable, but does not commit the new value yet

section.title: cfg.set_delayed_int
section.para: Prepare the change of a configuration variable, but does not commit the new value yet

section.title: cfg.set_delayed_string
section.para: Prepare the change of a configuration variable, but does not commit the new value yet

section.title: cfg.del_delayed
section.para: Prepare the deletion of the value of a configuration variable from a group instance, but does not commit the change yet

section.title: cfg.commit
section.para: Commit the previously prepared configuration changes

section.title: cfg.get
section.para: Get the value of a configuration variable

section.title: cfg.help
section.para: Print the description of a configuration variable

section.title: cfg.diff
section.para: List the pending configuration changes that have not been committed yet

section.title: cfg.add_group_inst
section.para: Add a new instance to an existing configuration group

section.title: cfg.del_group_inst
section.para: Delte an instance of a configuration group
